exportOnlies.description: Data to be exported from the snapshot. If this parameter is not provided, all the snapshot data is exported. Valid values are documented in the [AWS StartExportTask API documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/APIReference/API_StartExportTask.html#API_StartExportTask_RequestParameters).

exportTaskIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the snapshot export task.

failureCause.description: Reason the export failed, if it failed.

iamRoleArn.description: ARN of the IAM role to use for writing to the Amazon S3 bucket.

kmsKeyId.description: ID of the Amazon Web Services KMS key to use to encrypt the snapshot.

percentProgress.description: Progress of the snapshot export task as a percentage.

s3BucketName.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket to export the snapshot to.

s3Prefix.description: Amazon S3 bucket prefix to use as the file name and path of the exported snapshot.

snapshotTime.description: Time that the snapshot was created.

sourceArn.description:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the snapshot to export.

The following arguments are optional:

sourceType.description: Type of source for the export.

taskEndTime.description: Time that the snapshot export task completed.

taskStartTime.description: Time that the snapshot export task started.

warningMessage.description: Warning about the snapshot export task, if any.

exportOnlies.description: Data to be exported from the snapshot. If this parameter is not provided, all the snapshot data is exported. Valid values are documented in the [AWS StartExportTask API documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/APIReference/API_StartExportTask.html#API_StartExportTask_RequestParameters).
